content: अनुत्तम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न उत्तमो यस्मात्] {@--1@} Than which there is nothing better, having no superior or better, unsurpassed, the very best or highest, incomparably or pre-eminently the best; सर्वद्रव्येषु विद्यैव द्रव्यमाहुरनुत्तमं <ls>H. Pr. 4</ls>; कांक्षन् गतिमनुत्तमां <ls>Ms. 2. 242</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 87</ls>; अदस्त्वया नुन्नमनुत्तमं तमः <ls>Śi. 1. 27</ls> all-pervading; <ls>Bg. 7. 18</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 9</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 158</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 81.</ls> {@--2@} Not the best. {@--3@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Not used in the उत्तम or first, person. --मः <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva or Viṣṇu.
